name: VolleySolitaire
0:
”Alexa, open Volley Solitaire”
”Queen of Hearts”
”Five, Six, Seven, Eight”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: volley solitaire
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Volley Solitaire, the first ever Tripeaks Solitaire game for Alexa!

Tripeaks Solitaire is a fun and challenging game for players of all ages. Train your brain as you search for the perfect sequence of cards, or just relax and enjoy the fun!

It's easy to play, but hard to master! The rules are simple:
◆ Your goal is to move as many cards as you can from the top of the board to the bottom before your deck runs out!
◆ You can only pick a card if it is one higher or one lower than the card you currently have.

That's it! And once you've cleared the board once, see if you can clear the board in fewer moves! Go for the longest streak you can!

FEEDBACK
This is a public early access beta test, and we have ton of features still to come, thanks for trying it out!
Email us at solitaire@volleythat.com if you have any issues or feedback. We'd love to hear from you!
